data.title: WikiLeaks releases 300k Turkey govt emails in response to Erdogan’s post-coup purges
WikiLeaks suffers ‘sustained attack’ after announcing megaleak of Turkey govt docs

An elderly and cancer-stricken inmate in a New Zealand prison was forced to get his cellmate to clean his gangrenous black toes which were "ready to fall off" using toilet paper because the prison, which is managed by the multinational company Serco, failed to provide him with adequate care.
